package step2;
import step1.Person;
import step1.Date;
public class Student extends Person{
    private int reg_num; //学号
    private Date reg_day; //注册日期
   // TO DO YOU CODE HERE
   
   public Student() {
	   super();
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	   reg_day = new Date();
	   
   }
   
  
   public Student(String name,String num,Date birthday,int regnum,Date reg_day) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
   		super(name,num,birthday);
   		this.reg_day = reg_day;
   		this.reg_num =regnum;
	}
   
   public Student(String name,String num,int year,int month,int day,int reg_num,int x,int y,int z){
	   
   		super(name,num,year,month,day);
   		this.reg_num = reg_num;
   		reg_day = new Date(x,y,z);
   	   	
   }
   
   
   
   public int getReg_num() {
	return reg_num;
}


public void setReg_num(int reg_num) {
	this.reg_num = reg_num;
}
public void setinfo(String name,String num,Date birthday){
	super.setName(name);
	super.setNumber(num);
	super.setBirthday(birthday);
	
}

public Date getreg_day() {
	return reg_day;
}


public void setReg_day(Date reg_day) {
	this.reg_day = reg_day;
}


@Override
public String toString() {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	return "name="+super.getName()+" "+"number="+super.getNumber()+" "+"birthday:"+super.getBirthday()+"reg_num:"+this.reg_num+"reg_day:"+reg_day;
}
      
   
    





}
